item.title: 观点：Unhedged 的罗伯特-阿姆斯特朗（Robert Armstrong）写道："虽然优秀的管理可以让公司变得更好，但始终占据主导地位的大公司几乎总是具有结构性优势。
item.description:
Opinion: While great management can make companies much better, large companies that consistently dominate almost always have structural advantages, writes Unhedged’s Robert Armstrong https://t.co/sLVne62vXU pic.twitter.com/T8bPaKNxbl

— Financial Times (@FT) March 13, 2024
